focusedAbilities.desc:
At the start of your turn, add X to your Action Pool.
X is equal to the damage on your current health bar, to a maximum of 13. If your health bar is full, X = 3.
focusedAbilities.trigger: at the start of your turn

fusedAbilities.desc:
At the start of your turn, add X to your Action Pool.
X is equal to half the damage on your current health bar, rounded up, to a maximum of 9. If your health bar is full, X = 2.
fusedAbilities.trigger: at the start of your turn

franticAbilities.desc:
At the start of this turn, add X to your Action Pool.
X is equal to the damage on your current health bar, to a maximum of 13. If your health bar is full, X = 3.
franticAbilities.trigger: at the start of this turn

actions.name: I'm Still Here
actions.desc:
Push 4 and deal 4 damage to an enemy within range.
13+: Push 7 and deal 7 damage instead.

alphaSuper.name: Knuckle Sandwich
alphaSuper.desc: Deal 5 damage to an adjacent enemy, then give them 4 Weakness tokens and your Challenge token. Then, Push them 3.

deltaSuper.name: Everybody, Get 'Em!
deltaSuper.desc: Deal 3 damage to an adjacent enemy. Then, each of your allies in play (other than yourself) may each deal 3 damage to one enemy within their range.
